title: Scott Crouse from Earth Crisis
itunes:title: Scott Crouse from Earth Crisis
description:
In this episode we sit down with Scott Crouse the guitarist from Earth Crisis and discuss new records from The Antlers, Fucked Up and Manchester Orchestra. We also discuss misconceptions surrounding the band, fatherhood and debut a new song called "Total War" off of their upcoming full length called "Neutralize the Threat" out on July 12th on Century Media Records.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
